Our Work

  • Dolbeau

    Dolbeau is a men's fashion accessory brand that specializes in unique ties. LSL conceived the idea and developed Dolbeau into what it is today.

    Visit Dolbeau →

  • TwitterAudit

    TwitterAudit is a website that audits Twitter users to find out how many of their followers are real or fake. LSL invented, designed, and implemented the site.

    Visit TwitterAudit →

  • Rooney

    Rooney is a Montreal menswear boutique. LSL designed and implemented a custom Shopify theme for their online store which serves thousands of customers per month.

    Visit Rooney →

The Team

  • David Caplan

    Mr. Caplan (@davc) is a full-stack web developer and published scientist. He started using Linux at age 13 and first put his skills to work at 18 as an IT consultant. He's got a formal education in computational biology but web development is more fun, so that's what he does now.

    Education

    MSc Biochemistry
    University of Toronto
    BHSc Bioinformatics (Hons.)
    University of Calgary

  • David Gross

    Mr. Gross (@grossnasty) is an accountant-turned-designer & entrepreneur. The rest of his bio is in the works, but believe-you-me it'll be great.

    Education

    BComm Accountancy (Hons.)
    Concordia University
